list season complet oakland raider american footbal franchis nation footbal leagu (nfl). list document season-by-season record raiders' franchis 1960 present, includ postseason records, leagu award individu player head coaches. key[edit] note: finish, wins, losses, tie column list regular season result exclud postseason play. italic number mean record subject chang week due regular season postseason game played. afl champion (1960–1969) super bowl champion (1970–present) confer champion divis champion wild card berth seasons[edit] season team leagu confer divis regular season post season result award head coach finish win loss tie oakland raider (afl) 1960 1960 afl western 3rd 6 8 0 eddi erdelatz 1961 1961 afl western 4th 2 12 0 eddi erdelatz (0–2) marti feldman (2–10) 1962 1962 afl western 4th 1 13 0 marti feldman (0–5) red conkright (1–8) 1963 1963 afl western 2nd 10 4 0 al davi 1964 1964 afl western 3rd 5 7 2 al davi 1965 1965 afl western 2nd 8 5 1 al davi 1966 1966 afl western 2nd 8 5 1 john rauch 1967 1967 afl western 1st 13 1 0 afl championship (oilers) 40–7 lost super bowl ii (packers) 33–14 daryl lamonica (mvp) john rauch 1968 1968 afl western 1st 12 2 0 western divis playoff (chiefs) 41–6 lost afl championship (jets) 27–23 john rauch 1969 1969 afl western 1st 12 1 1 division playoff (oilers) 56–7 lost afl championship (chiefs) 17–7 daryl lamonica (mvp) john madden oakland raider (nfl) 1970 1970 nfl afc west 1st 8 4 2 division playoff (dolphins) 21–14 lost confer championship (colts) 27–17 john madden 1971 1971 nfl afc west 2nd 8 4 2 john madden 1972 1972 nfl afc west 1st 10 3 1 lost division playoff (steelers) 13–7 john madden 1973 1973 nfl afc west 1st 9 4 1 division playoff (steelers) 33–14 lost confer championship (dolphins) 27–10 playoff (bengals) 31–28 lost confer championship (steelers) 16–10 john madden 1976 1976 nfl afc west 1st 13 1 0 division playoff (patriots) 24–21 confer championship (steelers) 24–7 super bowl xi (1)
